<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Create ServiceNow User ID">bd1b3b3b47403110161c2d82e36d437d</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:8062c8cc47503110161c2d82e36d4318</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Create SN User ID Group show hide</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading /*|| newValue == ''*/ ) { // To make the none work correctly when selecting how many groups.
        return;
    }
    // Reset to not visible and mandatory
    var i = newValue; // instantiate and the counter 
    newValue++; // Add 1 to the counter to action starting with the next group
    for (i = newValue; i <= 9; i++) {
        g_form.setMandatory('group_' + i, false);
        g_form.setDisplay('group_' + i, false);
        g_form.clearValue('group_' + i);
    }
    // Show needed group fields
    var numberOfGroups = g_form.getValue("groups_needed");
    for (var j = 1; j <= numberOfGroups; j++) {
        g_form.setMandatory('group_' + j, true);
        g_form.setDisplay('group_' + j, true);
    }


}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-27 17:38:15</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>ca9321e547d47110161c2d82e36d43b8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create SN User ID Group show hide</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyCatalogItems" source="060a3bb747403110161c2d82e36d437f">060a3bb747403110161c2d82e36d437f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyCatalogItems">060a3bb747403110161c2d82e36d437f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_ca9321e547d47110161c2d82e36d43b8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-27 17:39:43</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
